actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE Tasks SET
		AssignedTo = '{{update_form.fieldState.AssignedTo.isVisible ? update_form.formData.AssignedTo : update_form.sourceData.AssignedTo}}',
		DueDate = '{{update_form.fieldState.DueDate.isVisible ? update_form.formData.DueDate : update_form.sourceData.DueDate}}',
    ProjectID = '{{update_form.fieldState.ProjectID.isVisible ? update_form.formData.ProjectID : update_form.sourceData.ProjectID}}',
		EstimatedHours = '{{update_form.fieldState.EstimatedHours.isVisible ? update_form.formData.EstimatedHours : update_form.sourceData.EstimatedHours}}',
		HoursLeft = '{{update_form.fieldState.HoursLeft.isVisible ? update_form.formData.HoursLeft : update_form.sourceData.HoursLeft}}',
		Requestor = '{{update_form.fieldState.Requestor.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Requestor : update_form.sourceData.Requestor}}',
		CompleteDate = '{{update_form.fieldState.CompleteDate.isVisible ? update_form.formData.CompleteDate : update_form.sourceData.CompleteDate}}',
		Task_Timestamp = '{{update_form.fieldState.Task_Timestamp.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Task_Timestamp : update_form.sourceData.Task_Timestamp}}',
		Task_UserName = '{{update_form.fieldState.Task_UserName.isVisible ? update_form.formData.Task_UserName : update_form.sourceData.Task_UserName}}',
		TaskDescription = '{{update_form.fieldState.TaskDescription.isVisible ? update_form.formData.TaskDescription : update_form.sourceData.TaskDescription}}',
		TaskStatus = '{{update_form.fieldState.TaskStatus.isVisible ? update_form.formData.TaskStatus : update_form.sourceData.TaskStatus}}'
  WHERE TaskID = {{data_table.selectedRow.TaskID}};
